= Env Editor 

The Env Editor menu only appears for users as superadmins

== overview

image::overview.png[width=800,align=center]

== Show .env file

Click Load to display .env

image::load-overview.png[width=800,align=center]

== Edit Value

Click the settings icon to edit the .env key value

image::edit.png[width=800,align=center]

== Add New

Enter Key and Value to add to the .env Configuration

image::add-new.png[width=800,align=center]

== Backups

image::backups.png[width=800,align=center]

== Create Backup

image::create-backup.png[width=800,align=center]

== Result Backup

image::result-backup.png[width=800,align=center]

Env backup file saved to `resources/backups/dotenv-editor`

image::path.png[align=center]

== Download current .env

image::download-currentenv.png[width=800,align=center]

The file download results.

image::env_file.png[align=center]

== Upload

image::upload.png[width=800,align=center]
